Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Type of the allowed includes. Allowed values are css and javascript.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
List of CSS / javascript files that should be included by default. The files are given as “|”-separated list.
Example: defaults="%(link.weak:/path/to/my/default.css)|%(link.weak:/path/to/my/alternative.css)"

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
If set to true, the HTML-tags produced by <cms:headincludes> are all closed according to the XHTML standard. Otherwise they are not explicitly closed if not necessary - as common practice.
Default: false

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Set the value to the type of the container that has the attribute detailview set to true. This may increase performance.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Set the value to the width of the container that has the attribute detailview set to true. This may increase performance.
